eligibility.right-to-work-intro: You do not need to use this service if the worker has any of the following:
eligibility.worker-has-ppt: a UK or Irish passport (or Irish passport card)
eligibility.worker-has-ho-docs: immigration documents from the Home Office that demonstrate a right to work
eligibility.worker-has-digital-right: a digital immigration satus that demonstrates a right to work

ineligible.header: You do not need to request a Home Office right to work check
ineligible.ineligible-intro: You do not need to request a right to work check if the worker:
ineligible.ineligible-has-ppt: has a UK or Irish passport or Irish passport card (current of expired)
ineligible.ineligible-has-ho-docs: has immigration documents from the Home Office that show a right to work
ineligible.ineligible-has-digital-right: has an immigration status which you can check online that demonstrates a right to work
ineligible.ineligible-outro-link: need to check that the employee's or prospective employee's documents are valid
ineligible.ineligible-outro-2: and keep copies of the documents.
